relnotes.name: File Logger

revision.description: Added an extra section to the CommsDebugUtility How To documentation FAQ listing the components which must be properly matched for logging to work on a target. Added extra RDebug output so that if a crash results from mismatched components then more information will be printed for the programmer to understand what has happened.

relnotes.purpose: Logging service which writes debugging or other informative messages to log files, originally networking specific but used by other components.

defect.title: new logging tags added to commdbg.ini
